Game.Name: Talmit's Adventure (Europe)
Game.plot: King Mole has taken over Marvel Land and imprisoned its guardian fairies! Not Princess Wonora, too? Is there no hero left in Marvel Land to save its citizens from the evil King Mole and his henchmen? Prince Talmit, save us!Cheat: Japanese version Level Passwords (Hard Mode)You first need to set the difficulty mode in the options before entering a difficulty specific password.Cheat: Japanese version Level Passwords (Hard Mode)You first need to set the difficulty mode in the options before entering a difficulty specific password.Cheat: Japanese version Level Passwords (Hard Mode)You first need to set the difficulty mode in the options before entering a difficulty specific password.Cheat: Japanese version Level Passwords (Hard Mode)You first need to set the difficulty mode in the options before entering a difficulty specific password.Cheat: Japanese version Level Passwords (Hard Mode)You first need to set the difficulty mode in the options before entering a difficulty specific password.
